input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Emojicon Strawberry Scented Poop Pillow

Item features:
14x14 fuzzy soft Emojicon pillow,pillow smells like strawberry
Ships from USA,this is not shipped from china..Faster Delivery
Guaranteed up to a year from purchase
All orders ship out in 48 hours! HIGHEST QUALITY.
Smells like strawberry
input_text.Response A: Who knew a pillow could be so funny? This 14x14 pillow is the perfect way to show off your sense of humor. This pillow smells like strawberry and is guaranteed up to a year from purchase. All orders ship out in 48 hours! This is not shipped from china. This is a higher quality pillow and shipped faster than other sellers.
input_text.Response B: The Emojicon Strawberry Scented Poop Pillow is the perfect novelty item for any home or office. This 14x14 pillow is made from high-quality fuzzy soft material that smells like fresh strawberries. This product is shipped from the USA, so you can expect fast delivery. The manufacturer guarantees the product will last up to a year from purchase. When you purchase this product, you can rest assured knowing that you are getting the highest quality item on the market.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
